title: Total number of stores of the LVMH Group worldwide 2008 to 2019
summary: In general Total number of stores has rose over the Year.
Total number of stores is gradually increasing from 2008 to 2014, roughly constant from 2014 to 2016, and finally roughly increasing from 2016 to 2017.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2010 and 2011.
The highest Total number of stores, of value 4374.0 was reached at Year 2017
The lowest Total number of stores, of value 2314.0 was reported at Year 2008
min_summary: Overall Total number of stores has increased over the Year.
